lexUnit.name: hear.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: perceive (a sound) with the ear

sentence.text: Loved to hear that mind at work .
The men were led into court to hear the charges read out to them .
She heard the indrawn breath hiss sharply through his teeth , and felt the wave of emotion that washed over him .

He was ashamed that Michael had heard his father-in-law speak to him like that .
He heard Lady whine her disappointment as the taller , quicker dog snapped another piece of Frankie 's sandwich from the air and swallowed it in a single gulp .
He had not heard them pass him ; he had been too intent on watching the singer .
One frog croaked , and then another , and then they could n't hear each other speak .

One night in bed I thought I heard knocking at the cottage door .

They heard quacking on the other side of the wall .
So it 's normally brought to us either by , the neighbours ringing in or somebody passing by saying they can hear screaming .

He could not hear me above the din of the crowd .

The woman lowered her voice so that Ianthe could hardly hear it above the noise of the train .
It would be untrue to have said it was impossible to hear the Beatles above the screaming .
The Doctor began to speak , in a voice so quiet Piper wondered how she could hear his words above the storm .
Some acid house parties can be heard miles away across the countryside : the inhabitants of normally quiet villages deserve protection .

Defries heard a chuckle behind her .
She was hanging about the waterfront when she heard steps behind her .
She could hear the animal below her , struggling on the icy path , and she followed it down .
Charsky heard a strange rustling sound beneath him .
At the Reception Desk , no one , but she could hear voices from a part of the room that was out of sight .
She heard muffled groans from the corner of the room by the television .
I could hear his voice in my ear .
They heard a car in the driveway , then the sound of footsteps rasping on brick paving , and the hum of a second car .
He was dipping his heavy aching head into a basin of cold water when he heard the sharp knock on the door , and was soon admitting Chief Inspector Morse and Sergeant Lewis into his bedroom .
She could hear voices on the path behind them , and she could hear every word they were saying .
I heard a voice just outside my window .
Yesterday afternoon , 7th February 1587 , we heard a horse outside our window .

I heard a loud explosion just to my left .

Then , not long after , they heard a great sound like the trampling of hooves .
